page.title: 05Education
page.content: {Northside Primary School,}Northside Rd Tel 3823, Headteacher Mr J Peacock. Children on role 89, staffing head plus 3.8 teachers. {St Michael's Infant School,}Station Rd Tel 2192, Headteacher Mrs A Grear. Children on role 76 + 50 part-time nursery pupils, staffing head plus 5 teachers. {St Patrick's R.C. School,}Brow Top, Tel 3138, Headteacher Miss K V Keegan (Sister Amelda). Children on role 144, staffing head plus 5.3 teachers. {Victoria Junior School,}Victoria Rd Tel 2296, Headteacher Mr H Horsley. Children on role 273, staffing head plus 12 teachers. {West Cumbria College,}Park Lane Tel 64331, Principle Mr E C Apperley Students on role 3800 aproximately, staffing 160 lecturers.
